page.title: IRA Adventures (Forbes.com)
page.text: Forbes.com - Peter Frankling tapped an unusual source to fund his new business, which makes hot-dog-shaped ice cream treats known as Cool Dogs: Two investors, one a friend and the other a professional venture capitalist, put in more than #36;100,000 each from their Individual Retirement Accounts. Later Franklin added #36;150,000 from his own IRA.
